channel.title: Pandoc Revealjs Markdown on Intellamech
channel.description: Recent content in Pandoc Revealjs Markdown on Intellamech

item.title: Main Title
item.description: # This slideshow is written in Markdown, a plain text format. view the slideshow in markdown Converted into an HTML5 document using Pandoc. Pandoc uses a template to convert the Markdown to HTML5. The HTML5 document is automatically formatted for use with and linked to reveal.js by the template. Reveal is a feature-rich javascript library that displays the slideshow. Yes, it really is that easy.
